marketplaces.name: wiremock-inc-skills
marketplaces.description: Agent skills for API simulation and testing with WireMock Cloud

files.README.md:
# WireMock Cloud Agent Skills

This repository contains a collection of [agent skills](https://agentskills.io/home) intended to work with WireMock Cloud.

# Installation

## Claude Code
To add this skills repository to your Claude Code config, type the following in Claude Code:

```
/plugin marketplace add wiremock-inc/skills
```

Then install a specific skill:

```
/plugin install api-simulation-builder@wiremock-inc-skills
```

plugins.name: api-simulation-builder
plugins.description: Generate a complete mock API in WireMock Cloud for any REST API. Creates an OpenAPI description, Arazzo test workflows, and WireMock stubs - optionally recorded from a live sandbox.
